name: JeSUS IS Here
text:
The lady who did handle my order, had a beautiful smile! She served me with such joy!
She was so on point, and gave great customer service experience!
My plant based pizza was do nice and hot! My children and I loved it!

name: Shannon Paparella
text: This has to be THE BEST Pizza Hut! I ordered and my food came super fast, was hot and everything perfect! The pizza was amazing and I was just blown away considering past experiences from other locations! Keep up the great work!

name: Helen Hayes
text: Great price, nice employees and good pizza. Please don't open my pizza box!! Otherwise great!

name: Astrid Quander
text: Ordered Pizza tonight for the family. The pizza still hasn't arrived. I called the store number and it transferred me to a call center, who then transferred me to the store. I have been on hold for a while. Still no pizza!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Miah Turner
text: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!! I ordered online and their website froze. They charged my card and then their manager MICHELLE told me it did not show up on their end and I would just have to order it again. Explained that they already ‚Ä¶More

name: Mariah Smith
text: Great in car pick up.

name: Claudia Alvarado
text: I liked their pizza until I recently ordered carry out.the vegetables and other toppings were burnt and dry.  The pizza barely had any sauce and they gave me the wrong sized soda.  When I asked to exchange the manager said it was too late and I had to end up buying a 16 oz in the original order and the 2 liter. not returning.

name: Meena Udeshi-Shaw
text: So, I ordered delivery on November 23rd, 2019 around 8:15-8:30pm (creedmoor location) I don't know who was working but it was the best damn pizza I have had from Pizza hut in at least 10+ years! My husband never gets the hand tossed because ‚Ä¶More

name: Christian Jones
text: Love the personal pan pizza, deal. Hits the spot.

name: Pat Bulka
text: There was a $3.00 delivery fee on today‚Äôs pizza but it does not go to the driver???That is wrong. Most will think they have tipped the driver already through this bogus charge. SHAME ShAME SHAME

name: Andrea Jae
text: Arrived at the store to pick up my order after placing it online. Walked in and stood at the counter for at least five minutes without anyone coming to assist. One guy was taking the pizzas out of the oven. The other gentleman just kept ‚Ä¶More

name: Elle Certified
text: Guy that checked me out definitely hates his job & Clearly wanted to get the hell out of there. Could hardly hear him he spoke so quietly. Pizza was ok it took forever for them to make it though.

name: Dylan Bergeron
text: Basically, I gave this location 3 out of 5 stars because, while the pizza didn‚Äôt taste bad at all, one of them was missing a core ingredient- one of the toppings I ordered on my pizza! Was supposed to be green pepper and ONION, but no onions at all. C‚Äômon, man.

name: meka harper
text: Jeremiah, is the Man he makes the bomb pizza.

name: Jonathan NGW
text: Perfect. One of my favorite locations.

name: Landy Pollock
text: üçï Pizza was great! Actually gave Me the Extra Cheese that I requested üëçüèΩ

name: Elise Rivenbark
text: I am used to bad service when I come to Pizza Hut, however, Jeremiah provided excellent service and won my business as long as he is employed there. He clearly doesn't remember me from when he worked on Duraleigh rd at the old pizza hut. He ‚Ä¶More

name: Colin McNaughton
text: I order from here once a year because I forget what happened the year before. Great staff, seriously, but they can't make pizza for a damn. Here's to next year <clink>!!!

name: Brian Mullis
text: The employees were so friendly

name: Aaron Bennear
text: this was the worst pizza I've ever had. got Buffalo wings that were cold but tasted ok.  got a pizza with "hand tossed" crust.  it was like a bad frozen pizza. crust was like a big piece of sandwich bread. soft, bland, wet from the sauce. ‚Ä¶More

name: Renee Bragg
text: Pizza hut all the way. From stuffed crust to personal pans to cinnasticks, they got it. This location is always prompt and never messes up an order. Plus so friendly all the time

name: Music Maestro
text: I attempted to order a pizza from this location for delivery since the closest location - Duraleigh Road - has closed and is not expected to be open until July 2015. This location is 4 miles from my house. I explained to them that my Pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Tristin Staten
text: Pizza hut was my preferred place for pizza until I did business with this location, not too long ago I ordered a pizza over the phone and the employee acted strange with my card info asking me to repeat it multiple times, long story short ‚Ä¶More

name: Simona Matlock
text: Can't speak highly enough of the customer service at this location!  After a mistake was made on our delivery order the manger Dave hand delivered the outstanding items and credited us for the inconvenience.  This will be my pizza shop from now on.  Thanks Dave, you're the man!

name: Andrea Alston
text: Jeremiah was very pleasant and is excellent manager material have been following him ever since he worked on Duraleigh rd. and he never ceases to provide excellent service every time I come get pizza. Thanks Jeremiah!

name: Brittle Fluffs
text: This pizza hut is awful. The store is dirty and whoever is in charge is obviously okay with just keeping it that way, cause its been like this for years. After 9 expect crappy service because they only have one or two drivers and one ‚Ä¶More

name: Rebecca Parker
text: Since they remodeled and got a new manager the pizza is awesome!!!!

name: Letisha Flowers
text: The best pizza!

name: Toni Wynn
text: It is my favorite Pizza Hut in the area. Service is very friendly, and the pizzas taste better at this particular location.
